TOPO: topo1.xml
mpiexec -bind-to rr -n 8 ./dummy
    10000000
    01000000
    00100000
    00010000
    00001000
    00000100
    00000010
    00000001

mpiexec -bind-to user:1,0,4,7 -n 4 ./dummy
    01000000
    10000000
    00001000
    00000001

mpiexec -bind-to user:1,0+2,4,5+6+7 -n 4 ./dummy
    01000000
    10100000
    00001000
    00000111

mpiexec -bind-to user:1x1,0+2,4+5x3,7x3 -n 8 ./dummy
    01000000
    10100000
    00001100
    00001100
    00001100
    00000001
    00000001
    00000001

mpiexec -bind-to user:0,1-7x7 -n 8 ./dummy
    10000000
    01111111
    01111111
    01111111
    01111111
    01111111
    01111111
    01111111

TOPO: topo1.xml
mpiexec -bind-to hwthread -map-by hwthread -n 16 ./dummy
    10000000
    01000000
    00100000
    00010000
    00001000
    00000100
    00000010
    00000001
    10000000
    01000000
    00100000
    00010000
    00001000
    00000100
    00000010
    00000001

mpiexec -bind-to hwthread -map-by hwthread -n 16 ./dummy
    1000000000000000
    0000000010000000
    0100000000000000
    0000000001000000
    0010000000000000
    0000000000100000
    0001000000000000
    0000000000010000
    0000100000000000
    0000000000001000
    0000010000000000
    0000000000000100
    0000001000000000
    0000000000000010
    0000000100000000
    0000000000000001

    0000000100000000
    0000000000010000
    0000000000000001
TOPO: topo2.xml

    0000111100001111
    0000111100001111
    0000111100001111
    0000111100001111
    0000111100001111
    0000111100001111

    00110000
    00001100
    00000011

    00110000

mpiexec -bind-to core -map-by core:4 -n 16 ./dummy
